Name:
HMS Oakley
Gneisenau
Identification:
pennant number: L98
pennant number: F212
Badge: On a Field Red, a  bugle horn erect and an annulet interlaced Gold
Displacement:
1,050 long tons (1,070 t) standard,
1,490 long tons (1,510 t) full load
Propulsion:
2 Admiralty 3-drum boilers
2 shaft Parsons geared turbines, 19,000 shp (14,000 kW)
Armament:
6 × QF 4 in Mark XVI guns on twin mounts Mk. XIX
4 × QF 2 pdr Mk. VIII (1 × quad mount)
2 × 20 mm Oerlikons
110 depth charges
